articles.title: People with dementia may be prescribed interacting drugs - Medical News Today
articles.description: A recent study finds that a significant proportion of people with dementia take three or more drugs that interact with the brain or central nervous system.
articles.content:
• Experts say that older adults with dementia should limit the number of medications they take that act on the brain and central nervous system (CNS).
